tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE advertising_campaigns ( 
    campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    company_name VARCHAR(255), 
    campaign_name VARCHAR(255), 
    start_date DATE, 
    end_date DATE, 
    budget DECIMAL(10, 2), 
    target_audience VARCHAR(255) 
);

CREATE TABLE AdCampaigns (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_name VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    spend DECIMAL(10, 2),
    clicks INT,
    conversions INT
);

CREATE TABLE PerformanceMetrics (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    ad_campaign_id INT,
    date DATE,
    impressions INT,
    clicks INT,
    conversions INT,
    cost DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE advertising_campaigns (
  campaign_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  company_id UUID,
  campaign_name VARCHAR(255),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  budget DECIMAL(10,2),
  status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE campaign_metrics (
  metric_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  campaign_id UUID,
  date DATE,
  impressions INT,
  clicks INT,
  conversions INT,
  revenue DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE company (
  company_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  company_name VARCHAR(255),
  industry VARCHAR(100),
  headquarters_location VARCHAR(255),
  website VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE AdvertisingCampaign (
    campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_name VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    budget DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE Impressions (
    impression_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_id INT,
    impression_date DATE,
    impression_time TIME,
    impression_count INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (campaign_id) REFERENCES AdvertisingCampaign(campaign_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Clicks (
    click_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    impression_id INT,
    click_date DATE,
    click_time TIME,
    click_count INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (impression_id) REFERENCES Impressions(impression_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Conversions (
    conversion_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    click_id INT,
    conversion_date DATE,
    conversion_time TIME,
    conversion_count INT,
    conversion_value DECIMAL(10, 2),
    FOREIGN KEY (click_id) REFERENCES Clicks(click_id)
);

CREATE TABLE AdvertisingCampaigns (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  campaign_name TEXT,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  budget DECIMAL,
  status TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE ClickData (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  campaign_id INT,
  click_time TIMESTAMP,
  user_id INT,
  product_id INT,
  device TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE ImpressionData (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  campaign_id INT,
  impression_time TIMESTAMP,
  user_id INT,
  product_id INT,
  location TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE ConversionData (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  campaign_id INT,
  conversion_time TIMESTAMP,
  user_id INT,
  product_id INT,
  revenue DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE UserFeedback (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  campaign_id INT,
  user_id INT,
  feedback TEXT,
  rating INT
)
